name: Electra Warehouse

name: Fungshon E-Commerce
tehnologies: Tailwind, React , FirebaseAuthentication, Font Awesome Icon , React Router Dom, React Icon, React Form Hook
details: This a front end Project for an ecommerce site name fungshon . In this website one can add cart to his favourite items , see his cart ,update his cart , login to his account . It is not connected to database . The data is loaded from fakeapi.com
